China and US reaffirm their commitment to nuclear security

They made the commitment after President Xi Jinping met his counterpart Barack Obama on the sidelines of the fourth Nuclear Security Summit.

  • Joint bid to fight global nuclear risk

Govt will ramp up efforts to attract foreign investors: Premier

Premier Li Keqiang said China will nurture a fairer environment for market competition and will bolster intellectual property rights protection.

  • China premier vows opening to foreign investors

Anbang abandons $14b bid to buy Starwood hospitality chain

The insurance group says in a statement that due to various market considerations, the consortium has decided not to proceed further.

  • Anbang says Starwood bid 'in line with rules'

Nation's manufacturing activity expands unexpectedly

The purchasing managers' index came in at 50.2 in March, adding to hopes that downward pressure on the world's second-largest economy is easing.

  • China manufacturing activity contracts in January

Baidu seeks help from sci-fi writers to realize AI ambition

The Internet giant wants to bring the best science fiction writers together with leading scientists in a quest to turn imagination into reality.

  • Baidu asks for govt attention on auto-driving

SAFE buys into A-share market to perfect forex management

Wutongshu Investment Platform, wholly owned by the State Administration of Foreign Exchange, has just become a major shareholder of five banks.

  • Falling forex reserves expected: PBOC

Damaged corpses can get 3D facelifts before funeral

The deceased victim of an accident whose face or head was disfigured can now appear perfect before the funeral through 3D printing technology.

  • Mourners get paid to pay respects

Big city home prices rise despite tightening measures

New home prices in Shanghai jumped 5.1% from February to March, a sharp acceleration from 0.22% growth in February, according to official data.

  • Cities move to tame property prices
